canonical_explanation.english: A polynomial in one variable is an algebraic expression in which the variable has only non-negative integer powers.

checkpoint_questions.prompt: Is 5x^{-3} + 2 a polynomial? Why or why not?
checkpoint_questions.expected_answer: No, because the exponent is negative.
No, because fractional powers are not allowed.

expected_mistakes.description: Believing any algebraic expression is a polynomial
